alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Iberville; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 3:12PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ascension, northwestern St. James, southeastern Iberville and northern Assumption Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pierre Part, or near Belle River, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Paincourtville, Geismar, Belle Rose and Convent. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Iberville; St. James; Western Ascension
